tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: Students should be taught academic knowledge so that they can pass exams, and skills such as cooking or dressing should not be taught. To what extent do you agree/disagree?
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
